title: CONTRIBUTING
text: Small typos grammatical errors documentation may edited directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. YES: edit roxygen comment .R file R/. : edit .Rd file man/.

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: make substantial pull request, always file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s problem. ’ve found bug, create associated issue illustrate bug minimal reprex.

title: CONTRIBUTING
text: recommend create Git branch pull request (PR). Look Travis AppVeyor build status making changes. README contain badges continuous integration services used package. recommend tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2. use testthat. Contributions test cases included easier accept. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md current development version header describing changes made followed GitHub username, links relevant issue(s)/PR(s).

title: Access NASA's Exoplanet Archive Data
text: goal exoplanets provide access NASA’s Exoplanet Archive TAP Service. functionality package minimal simply R interface access exoplanet data.

title: Access NASA's Exoplanet Archive Data
text: Install released version exoplanets CRAN: can install GitHub :

title: Access NASA's Exoplanet Archive Data
text: basic example shows access data k2names table: wish, can select columns need: can also specify number rows returned using limit: Information tables columns available can found :
code: library(exoplanets)  options(   exoplanets.progress = FALSE, # hide progress   readr.show_types = FALSE     # hide col spec, requires readr 2.0.0 >= )  exoplanets("k2names") #> • https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/TAP/sync?query=select+*+from+k2names&format=csv #> # A tibble: 449 x 3 #>    epic_id        k2_name  pl_name      #>    <chr>          <chr>    <chr>        #>  1 EPIC 246199087 K2-112 f TRAPPIST-1 f #>  2 EPIC 246199087 K2-112 h TRAPPIST-1 h #>  3 EPIC 211331236 K2-117 c K2-117 c     #>  4 EPIC 212398486 K2-125 b K2-125 b     #>  5 EPIC 217941732 K2-130 b K2-130 b     #>  6 EPIC 228754001 K2-132 b K2-132 b     #>  7 EPIC 247887989 K2-133 d K2-133 d     #>  8 EPIC 247589423 K2-136 b K2-136 b     #>  9 EPIC 247589423 K2-136 d K2-136 d     #> 10 EPIC 201912552 K2-18 c  K2-18 c      #> # … with 439 more rows exoplanets("ps", c("pl_name", "hostname")) #> • https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/TAP/sync?query=select+pl_name,hostname+from+ps&format=csv #> # A tibble: 29,683 x 2 #>    pl_name      hostname   #>    <chr>        <chr>      #>  1 Kepler-11 c  Kepler-11  #>  2 Kepler-11 f  Kepler-11  #>  3 HAT-P-1 b    HAT-P-1    #>  4 OGLE-TR-10 b OGLE-TR-10 #>  5 TrES-2 b     TrES-2     #>  6 WASP-3 b     WASP-3     #>  7 HD 210702 b  HD 210702  #>  8 BD-08 2823 b BD-08 2823 #>  9 BD-08 2823 c BD-08 2823 #> 10 HAT-P-30 b   HAT-P-30   #> # … with 29,673 more rows exoplanets("keplernames", limit = 5) #> • https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/TAP/sync?query=select+*+from+keplernames+top+5&format=csv #> # A tibble: 5 x 4 #>     kepid koi_name  kepler_name   pl_name       #>     <dbl> <chr>     <chr>         <chr>         #> 1 7515212 K00679.02 Kepler-212 b  Kepler-212 b  #> 2 8210018 K02762.01 Kepler-1341 b Kepler-1341 b #> 3 9008737 K02768.01 Kepler-404 b  Kepler-404 b  #> 4 4833421 K00232.05 Kepler-122 f  Kepler-122 f  #> 5 9963524 K00720.02 Kepler-221 d  Kepler-221 d tableinfo #> # A tibble: 546 x 13 #>    table database_column_… table_label description  in_ps_table in_ps_comp_pars… #>    <chr> <chr>             <chr>       <chr>        <lgl>       <lgl>            #>  1 ps    default_flag      Default Pa… Boolean fla… TRUE        FALSE            #>  2 ps    soltype           Solution T… Disposition… TRUE        FALSE            #>  3 ps    pl_controv_flag   Controvers… Flag indica… TRUE        TRUE             #>  4 ps    pl_name           Planet Name Planet name… TRUE        TRUE             #>  5 ps    hostname          Host Name   Stellar nam… TRUE        TRUE             #>  6 ps    pl_letter         Planet Let… Letter assi… TRUE        TRUE             #>  7 ps    hd_name           HD ID       Name of the… TRUE        TRUE             #>  8 ps    hip_name          HIP ID      Name of the… TRUE        TRUE             #>  9 ps    tic_id            TIC ID      Name of the… TRUE        TRUE             #> 10 ps    gaia_id           GAIA ID     Name of the… TRUE        TRUE             #> # … with 536 more rows, and 7 more variables: #> #   uncertainties_column_positive_negative <chr>, limit_column <chr>, #> #   default <lgl>, notes <chr>, displayed_string_name <chr>, flag_column <lgl>, #> #   number_of_measurements <lgl>

title: Access NASA's Exoplanet Archive Data
text: one time, package used Exoplanet Archive Application Programming Interface (API). Since , handful tables transitioned Table Access Protocol (TAP) service. tables transitioned TAP , package supports queries TAP. information, can read https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/docs/exonews_archive.html#29April2021.

title: Access NASA's Exoplanet Archive Data
text: Please note package released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

text: Maintainer: Tyler Littlefield tylerlittlefield@hey.com (ORCID) contributors: Maëlle Salmon [contributor, reviewer] Mathida Chuk [contributor]

what: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
text: simple interface accessing exoplanet data. bare minimum, table name required. Tables names documented `tableinfo` dataset.

title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
code: exoplanets(table, columns = NULL, limit = NULL, format = "csv")

title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
text: https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/

title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
text: table table name, see `tableinfo`. columns vector valid column names, default return default columns, see `tableinfo`. limit Number rows return. NULL, returns data table. format Desired format, either csv, tsv, json.

title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
text: data.frame format="csv" format="tsv". list format="json".

title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
text: one time, package used Exoplanet Archive Application Programming Interface (API). Since , handful tables transitioned Table Access Protocol (TAP) service. tables transitioned TAP , package supports queries TAP. information, can read https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/docs/exonews_archive.html#29April2021.

title: Retrieve Data from NASAs Exoplanet Archive — exoplanets
code: if (interactive()) {   # request all default columns from the `ps` table   exoplanets("ps")    # request the planet name and discovery method from the `ps` table   exoplanets("ps", c("pl_name", "discoverymethod"))    # request the first 5 rows from the `keplernames` table   exoplanets("keplernames", limit = 5)    # request in json format (returns list)   exoplanets("ps", c("pl_name", "discoverymethod"), format = "json")  }

title: Clear the exoplanets cache — forget_exoplanets
text: Forget past results reset exoplanets cache.

title: Table Information — tableinfo
text: dataset provides table information NASA's Exoplanet Archive TAP service. particular, table name, columns, column descriptions provided.

title: Table Information — tableinfo
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 546 rows 13 columns.

title: Table Information — tableinfo
text: https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/docs/TAP/usingTAP.html

title: Table Information — tableinfo
code: tableinfo #> # A tibble: 546 × 13 #>    table database_column_name table_label           description      in_ps_table #>    <chr> <chr>                <chr>                 <chr>            <lgl>       #>  1 ps    default_flag         Default Parameter Set Boolean flag in… TRUE        #>  2 ps    soltype              Solution Type         Disposition of … TRUE        #>  3 ps    pl_controv_flag      Controversial Flag    Flag indicating… TRUE        #>  4 ps    pl_name              Planet Name           Planet name mos… TRUE        #>  5 ps    hostname             Host Name             Stellar name mo… TRUE        #>  6 ps    pl_letter            Planet Letter         Letter assigned… TRUE        #>  7 ps    hd_name              HD ID                 Name of the sta… TRUE        #>  8 ps    hip_name             HIP ID                Name of the sta… TRUE        #>  9 ps    tic_id               TIC ID                Name of the sta… TRUE        #> 10 ps    gaia_id              GAIA ID               Name of the sta… TRUE        #> # ℹ 536 more rows #> # ℹ 8 more variables: in_ps_comp_pars_table <lgl>, #> #   uncertainties_column_positive_negative <chr>, limit_column <chr>, #> #   default <lgl>, notes <chr>, displayed_string_name <chr>, flag_column <lgl>, #> #   number_of_measurements <lgl>

title: exoplanets 0.2.3
text: Fix HTML5 issue.

title: exoplanets 0.2.2
text: CRAN release: 2021-07-24 tableinfo updated include additional tables.

title: exoplanets 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2021-05-17

title: exoplanets 0.2.1
text: progress parameter exoplanets longer available. replaced option can set options.

title: exoplanets 0.2.1
text: Added forget_exoplanets clear exoplanets cache. Added package level documentation usethis::use_package_doc. Added limit parameter exoplanets. Added quiet option suppress progress query message. Cleaned tableinfo remove trailing spaces small improvements.

title: exoplanets 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-05-10 Complete rewrite work new TAP service: https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/docs/TAP/usingTAP.html longer supporting older API: https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/docs/program_interfaces.html Use httr progress indicators better request handling. Added tableinfo dataset table column information. Removed exo_ functions, added exoplanets single function extracting data. Added memoization exoplanets. Using httptest avoid potential CRAN errors checking package. Precompiled vignettes avoid potential CRAN errors checking package. Transferred ownership ropensci organization.

title: exoplanets 0.1.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
